Collaboration in software repository projects

Most of my software contributions can be accessed on My GitHub Profile. But there is a couple of external repositories where I have collaborated. I list them:

  1. sibc ðŸ”— (latest version here ðŸ”—): a python3-code library dedicated to supersingular isogeny-based cryptography constructions;
  2. Fully projective radical isogenies in constant-time ðŸ”—: a constant-time Python-code implementation of CSURF and the radical isogeny procedures;
  3. ECCKiila ðŸ”—: a dynamic ECC SW stacks generator w/good security properties and fast performance, which includes rigging for downstream projects such as OpenSSL, gost-engine, NSS, etc;
